body_html:
@automateljw The Dataset API is the recommended way to combine train and eval input pipelines in the same Session. Read about it here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets

In particular, there is an example of exactly this usage here (search for reinitializable iterator):
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets#creating_an_iterator

Does this resolve your issue?

body:
@automateljw The Dataset API is the recommended way to combine train and eval input pipelines in the same Session.  Read about it here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets

In particular, there is an example of exactly this usage here (search for `reinitializable iterator`):
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets#creating_an_iterator

Does this resolve your issue?
